name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Google Maps Route Optimization by Upper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your list of stops to optimized routes right in Google Maps for free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upper’s extension allows you to optimize multi-stop routes straight in Google Maps without switching windows or copy pasting addresses. 

To get the shortest route on Google Maps, simply add upto 10 stops in Google Maps, and click on Upper’s extension. Select Optimize and you are done. Upper’s advanced algorithm does all the hard work for you, allowing you to spend time on other activities. 

Save hours of planning time and spend less on fuel with Upper.

About Upper:

Upper is a route management software designed for all kinds of businesses: delivery, field service and maintenance, and for fleets of all sizes. With Upper, solo drivers as well as teams operate in a streamlined manner.
